name: Capstone: Liberty Chatbot

examples.text: Hello I am looking for some help here
can you tell me about chikfila
Can you tell me where i can it on campus
hi can you tell me about dining location
can you tell me what hours chik-fil-a are open
How is my credit card info secured?
What guards do you have in place to protect your customer's data?
Can I be sure that my stored card details are held securely?
Do you have protection against hacks?
How do I know if my card info is kept safe?
How do I know this chat is not a scam?
Why would I trust this chat?
I'd like proof of a secure chat
In what way can I tell if my plastic is safe?
Is there a reason to distrust this chat?
Is this a trusted chat site?
What safety measures are used to ensure that chat is secure?

intents.description: Express concerns about the security of the bot.

examples.text: Can you tell me a joke?

what else can you tell me?

can you help me find housing?

Do you have a list of things I can talk to you about?
Hi how can you help me?
hi can you tell me about liberty?
Hi can you tell me about campus
Can you tell me what services you are able to help me with?
Can you please give me a list of the types of things you can help me with?
I'd like to know what type of questions you can answer for me.

I do not know what to ask
What else can you help me with?
What kinds of things can you do?
Where can I find the frequently asked questions?
I need to speak to a representative. How would I go about doing so?
I don't want to talk to you
How can I skip the recorded menu and go straight to a live person?
I want an agent to help me
Please assist me to get to an agent
Please connect me to a live agent
Please let me talk to a human being.
Yes, take me to a real person
Can I connect to an agent?
Can I speak to a human please?
Can I speak to a live person?
Can I speak to an advisor?
Can you assist me to connect to an agent?
Can you connect me with a real person?
Connect me to a live operator please.
Could you please transfer me to your master?
I don't want to talk to a bot.
Is there anyone there I can actually talk to for real?
I would like to speak to someone
I would like to speak to a human
I want to talk to a person
You gave me exactly what I need!
Can't believe you are that good
I like what you did there! :)
I'm looking forward to working with you again! :)
How can you prove you are a human?
Tell me, are you a human or no?
Am I chatting with a human?
Am I talking to a Bot?
Am I talking to a person or am I talking to an AI?
Are you a human or a bot?

intents.description: Ask if speaking to a human or a bot.

description: Project for CSIS 374 using IBM's Watson Assistant for Liberty University

values.text: Your Best option is The Quads on South Campus,

Students at The Hill will have their mail delivered to the Liberty post office located at Green Hall Room 1846.
The Circle does not include a kitchen, students may bring a mini fridge (15 amps or less) and microwave for their convenience.

•Unlimited, buffet-style at Reber Thomas •10 swipes per week to be used for select items at select on-campus dining locations (swipes reset on Saturday morning) •See what you can get with a basic swipe. •\$120 Dining Dollars •\$80 Flames Cash
Liberty offers several dining options, would you like some help finding which dining plan best fits you?

•Unlimited, all-you-can-eat at Reber Thomas •10 Plus swipes per week to be used for select items at all dining locations (swipes reset on Saturday morning) •See what you can get with a basic swipe. •\$120 Dining Dollars •\$80 Flames Cash

•For Commuters Only •30, 60, or 90 Plus swipes per semester to be used on select items at select dining locations. The plan expires at end of the semester, unused meal swipes will be forfeited. Commuter meal plans are non-refundable. •See what you can get with a Plus swipe.

values.text: South Tower has laundry facilities located at building 033-1.  Only females are permitted in this building.
Students who live in South Tower can receive their mail at Green Hall room 1846.
South Tower does not include a kitchen, students may bring a mini fridge (15 amps or less) and microwave for their convenience.
Each hall has a dedicated router, Liberty itself does not support wireless printers and Ethernet cables as it is a security risk to the on campus network.

A South Tower 2 Person Room is \$2,900 per semester

What will you do?

  -  Attend college classes with professors who have spent years influencing their fields
  - Stay overnight in a college dorm with current Liberty students 
  - Eat in our award-winning dining hall with over 20 available food stations
  - Enjoy our on-campus activities, including a concert by a top Christian artist, an NCAA athletic event, and so much more!

generic.title: Here is what I can tell you about CFAW.

input.text: when is CFAW?

values.text: Students who are visiting for CFAW will have access to the Reber Thomas Dining Hall once every hour.

Liberty University's CFAW is \$50 for Lodging, Food, and to all the Liberty athletic events over the weekend. If you have already submitted your confirmation deposit the fee is waved and you can attend for free.
The Residential Commons (001, 002, and 003) offers a traditional residence hall community with 2 person rooms with twin beds, wardrobes, desks for each student and private bath per room.
The most popular choice, the commons dorm rooms offer two occupants and averages \$3,750 per semester

values.text: Commons offers laundry facilities on every floor and accepts flames cash.

Each room has a dedicated router with several routers located in the common area. Liberty itself does not support wireless printers and Ethernet cable as it is a security risk to the on campus network.

The Residence Halls officially close for the Spring 2019 semester on May 8, 2018, at 12 p.m. If you would like to stay after the residence halls officially close, you may submit a Beyond Checkout Request. Requests will be available for submission April 1-19, 2019.

Please allow 3-5 business days for processing after submitting your request.
